name: PointTest
description: Unit tests for the Point class, focusing on coordinates, distance calculations, and equality checks.

test_cases.name: testCoordinates
test_cases.description: Tests the coordinates retrieval of a Point.

test_cases.name: testDistanceToRectangle
test_cases.description: Tests the distance calculation from a Point to a Rectangle.

test_cases.name: testDistanceToPoint
test_cases.description: Tests the distance calculation between two Points.

test_cases.name: testMbr
test_cases.description: Tests the equality of two Points created with the same coordinates.

test_cases.name: testPointIntersectsItself
test_cases.description: Tests that a Point intersects with its own Minimum Bounding Rectangle (MBR).

test_cases.name: testIntersectIsFalseWhenPointsDiffer
test_cases.description: Tests that two slightly different Points do not intersect.

test_cases.name: testEquality
test_cases.description: Tests the equality of two Points with the same coordinates.

test_cases.name: testInequality
test_cases.description: Tests the inequality of two Points with different y-coordinates.

test_cases.name: testInequalityToNull
test_cases.description: Tests that a Point is not equal to null.

test_cases.name: testHashCode
test_cases.description: Tests the hash code generation for a Point.

test_cases.name: testDoesNotContain
test_cases.description: Tests that a Point does not contain a different coordinate.

test_cases.name: testContains
test_cases.description: Tests that a Point contains its own coordinates.
